title: Oil Search says Managing Director Peter Botten to retire next August
text:
Oil Search says Managing Director Peter Botten to retire next August

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 01, 2019 09:10)

© Reuters. Oil Search says Managing Director Peter Botten to retire next August Oct 1 (Reuters) - Oil Search Ltd on Tuesday said Managing Director Peter Botten will retire from the firm next year and will be succeeded by Keiran Wulff. Botten, a company veteran who served as managing director for 25 years, will retire and step down from the board on Aug. 25, 2020.

Oil Search says Managing Director Peter Botten to retire next August
